sub_title: SAP HCM and SuccessFactors Consultant at myBrand & Co-Owner of Vino Brabo
summary:
In the past years I gained a lot of interest and experience in SAP HCM and SuccessFactors Employee Central. First as an intensive user and currently as a senior consultant. My main focus is Time Management next to Payroll, Organisational Management and Personnel Administration. 

In addition to the technical experience in SAP HCM and SuccessFactors, I also have managerial experience gathered as team leader and test lead at NorthgateArinso in Budapest, Hungary. In this position I had supervision over 5-10 advisors located in Budapest and in satellite offices in Moscow and Tel Aviv. With the team I was responsible for the HR and Payroll administration in upto 24 EMEA countries.

With my hands-on experience as SAP HR consultant, my management skills and my technical and analytical background as Master of Science in Aerospace Engineering, the position as SAP consultant is particularly relevant to my interest and experience. The knowledge that I gained in these 3 disciplines is a good basis for a further growth in my career as SAP consultant.

profile_positions.description: Co-owner of our wine web shop
profile_positions.title: Co-Owner Vino Brabo

profile_positions.description:
Focus of Work
- SAP HCM: Modules PT, PY, PA, OM, TV
- Maintenance of schemas, rules, tables, features 
- Design and implementation of new functionalities 
- Subproject management, Project controlling 
- SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central 
- Integration between SuccessFactors and SAP HCM

Projects
- International Automotive Company: SAP HCM system maintenance and optimisation for time management following agile methodology 
- International Automotive Company: Integration of SuccessFactors and SAP HCM with the use of SAP HANA Cloud Integration 
- International Company for Healthcare and Life Sciences: SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central system maintenance and optimisation
- International Power and Gas Company: SAP HCM system maintenance and optimisation for payroll, time management, travel cost management, organisational management, interfaces and personnel administration
- Engineering Service Company for Automotive Industry: SAP HCM system implementation of the Time Management module
- Engineering Service Company for Automation Solutions: SAP HCM system implementation of the Time Management module and subproject management
- Caravan and Camper Van Manufacturer: SAP HCM implementation of an HR mini-master for the assignment of back-office staff and field representatives to the client accounts
- Electronics Service Company: SAP HCM system implementation of modules Personnel Administration, Time Management and Payroll in the four German subsidiaries
profile_positions.title: Senior SAP HR Consultant

profile_positions.company: NGA Human Resources, an Alight company
profile_positions.description:
SAP HR consultant in the field of payroll, time, organisational management and personnel administration for the Dutch customers.

Tasks involve:
* Responsible for ticket management as single point of contact for 3 customers
* Analysing and solving SAP HR and payroll related issues of the customers
* Customising country specific and client specific tables and data in SAP HR
* Involved in the implementation of 5 new customer accounts to Granada
profile_positions.title: SAP HR Consultant

profile_positions.company: NGA Human Resources, an Alight company
profile_positions.description:
Team Leader and Test Lead at two accounts. 

Tasks involved:
* Supervision over 5-10 advisors located in Budapest and in satellite offices in Moscow and Tel Aviv
* Responsible for the HR and Payroll administration in upto 24 EMEA countries
* Subject Matter Expert in SAP HR
* Training colleagues on SAP HR
* Involved in the migration of the account of an international telecommunications company from UK to Hungary

* Interviewing and hiring of new advisors
profile_positions.title: Team Leader and Test Lead HR Service Centre

profile_positions.description:
Team leader at the Customer Support department for an international appliances company and staff member at the customer support department for an international auction site

Tasks involved:
* Supervision over 15-20 agents working for the customer support department for the Dutch, the German and the Central European market
* Involved in implementation of the new client account
* Subject Matter Expert in the SAP production module
* Interviewing and hiring of new agents

profile_positions.title: Team Leader

profile_positions.description:
Department of Manufacturing Engineering for Glare and Metal Bonding

Internship and master thesis research
The objective of the internship was finding methods of streamlining the production process of Glare panels for the Airbus A380. One of the defined methods was worked out in more detail during the master thesis project. The research entailed the introduction of a polythene covering film on the glass fibre prepreg material that is used in the production of Glare panels for the Airbus A380. Together with the introduction of the film, a security system had to be developed to prevent film inclusions in the Glare laminate.
profile_positions.title: Manufacturing Engineer
